publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4190 Stewart Maxwell: Congratulations to Mearns Primary School Pupils—That the Parliament congratulates primary six pupils Rory Robertson and Matthew Wilson of Mearns Primary School in East Renfrewshire on reaching the final of the Ready, Willing and Mobile Competition; applauds the innovative design of their Cool Cube concept, which acts as a sensory device to alert pedestrians to approaching traffic when crossing the road; notes that the young inventors designed the safety device after reading an online case study of a person with Down’s syndrome who was too scared to cross the road on his own; further notes that theirs is the only Scottish entry in the running for the top prize at the Mobility Roadshow competition, and wishes them the best of luck for the final on 6 June 2009. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bill Wilson*, Maureen Watt*, Stuart McMillan*, Angela Constance*, Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Alasdair Allan*, Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*
